response.original_title: The Impaler: A Biographical/Historical Look at the Life of Vlad the Impaler, Widely Known as Dracula
response.overview: Dracula: A Biography of Vlad Impaler: Radu Florescu: 9780801522208: Books ... As the title implies, there is an open-biased against the historical Prince Vlad III Dracula. ... would anyone have dared to call him Vlad Tepes to his face during his lifetime. .... An interesting book and a very rare one as well. ... Get to Know Us.
